Vishra
Wednesday, August 9th, 2017, 8:43:45 AM

When you first bond to your weapon, you can use 1604 to get the flares. (Otherwise you need to go up a bonding level before they show up) And 1602/1615 are the ony two spells you can infuse. Honestly, I never use that ability.

Erous
Friday, November 3rd, 2017, 10:41:25 AM

Spirit lore summoning is the potency of the 2nd flare. Spirit lore blessings is what you want for secondary flare frequency:

The base chance for a second flare increases by 4% per seed 3 summation, from an additional 4% chance at 3 ranks to a maximum bonus of 68% at 187 ranks

https://gswiki.play.net/Consecrate_(1604)

Vishra
Friday, November 3rd, 2017, 10:42:12 AM

Translation- you just need more blessing lore!

Friday, November 3rd, 2017, 11:20:12 AM

Erous
Friday, November 3rd, 2017, 12:09:25 PM

I've found that Blessings lore gives the most direct, added benefit across all your spells, but doesn't really have any milestone marks like Religion and Summoning. What I did with my trains is soft cap religion and summoning to milestones I wanted to reach, then begin dumping 1x into blessings for life. Not saying that's the best way, but it was my way and seemed to work well.

Kaight
Friday, November 3rd, 2017, 12:17:58 PM

I hit cap on my paladin a month back and am currently 40 blessing, 30 religion, and 40 summoning.

40 Summoning so I can port my body to the beginning of OTF if I die. 30 Religion for the 15% reduction to DS against mobs. 40 Blessing for the +5 to Guard the Meek.

After I 2x CM I plan on getting to 120 Blessing Lore.
